bibl.author: F. U. Stitt
bibl.title: F. U. Stitt to S. L. M. Barlow, 31 October 1867
bibl.idno: Entry 10, Record Group 60, Letter Book F

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I am directed by the Attorney General to say, in reply to yours of the 23d inst. that upon the day of the date of your letter, U. S. Attorney Rosette was directed by this Office to dismiss the libel in the case of the United States, vs. 1756 shares of the Great Western Railroad, belonging to Le Roy M. Wiley, upon the payment of the costs.
